member.name: T:s4pi.Extensions.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:s4pi.Extensions.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:s4pi.Extensions.Properties.Resources.Extensions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 0x00AE6C67 BONE .skcon 0x00B2D882 _IMG .dds 0x00B552EA _SPT .tree 0x010077BB _AUD .mp3 0x010077C4 _AUD .wav 0x010077CA _AUD .xa 0x015A1849 GEOM .simgeom 0x0166038C _KEY .keyname 0x01661233 MODL .model 0x0175E5CD SCPT .oldscript 0x0181B0D2 _AUD .abk 0x01A527DB _AUD .snr 0x01D0E75D MATD .material 0x01D10F34 MLOD .lod 0x01EEF63A _AUD .sns 0x02019972 MTST .mtst 0x021D7E8C SPT2 .speedtree 0x022B756C WRDH .wdescnamehash 0x024A0E52 CNFG .cf [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: A look-up from resource type to resource "tag" and file extension. The collection is read-only.

member.name: T:s4pi.Extensions.FileNameConverter
member.summary: Utility class to convert file names or paths in the TS4 resource name convention to the s4pe convention.

member.name: M:s4pi.Extensions.FileNameConverter.IsValidFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the given is a valid TS4 resource file name.

member.name: M:s4pi.Extensions.FileNameConverter.ConvertToPackageManagerConvention(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified TS4 file name or path to its s4pe equivalent.
